name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D】みんなとの絆をチェックして、歌って重大告知を目指す！【#トワ様重大発表】 [t2j89jXBhO8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Cinematic recap of 2021-2023 leading to the announcement of Tokoyami Towa's 1st Album 'ASTER'.
Cinematic teaser exploring the concept of 'myself' as a VTuber.

subtitles.original: 様々な出会いが運命を変えていく
subtitles.english: Various encounters changed fate

subtitles.original: 晴れの日も、雨の日も、信じる道を一歩ずつ歩み
subtitles.english: On sunny days and rainy days, walking the path I believe in one step at a time

subtitles.original: 世界と繋がった、多様な想いが芽生え
subtitles.english: Connected with the world, various feelings sprouted

subtitles.original: 今、開花する
subtitles.english: Now, blooming

subtitles.original: 1st アルバム 発売決定！
subtitles.english: 1st Album release decided!

subtitles.original:
ASTER
Tokoyami Towa 1st Album "Aster"
subtitles.english:
ASTER
Tokoyami Towa 1st Album "Aster"

subtitles.original:
常闇トワ 1st Album ASTER
2023.9.27 Release
subtitles.english:
Tokoyami Towa 1st Album ASTER
2023.9.27 Release

subtitles.original: 生まれた 赤い花
subtitles.english: The red flower that was born

subtitles.original: ただこの国
subtitles.english: Just in this country

subtitles.original: ゆらゆら
subtitles.english: Swaying

subtitles.original: 答えのないまま
subtitles.english: Without an answer

subtitles.original: 運命はもろく 愚かな結末
subtitles.english: Fate is a fragile and foolish ending

subtitles.original: 磔にされた心は泣いてる
subtitles.english: The crucified heart is crying

subtitles.original: 手のひらから散る 悲し雫が
subtitles.english: The sad drops scattering from the palm of my hand

subtitles.original: あなたには見えていないのでしょう
subtitles.english: You probably cannot see them

subtitles.original: ならば ここまで
subtitles.english: If so, this far

subtitles.original: 悲しい声に言葉に追いやられて
subtitles.english: Driven away by sad voices and words

subtitles.original: 俯いたまま 微笑んだ赤い花
subtitles.english: The red flower smiled while looking down

subtitles.original: 深く根を張る痛みが 贖罪なら
subtitles.english: If the deep-rooted pain is atonement

subtitles.original: 分かり合えない ずっとこのまま
subtitles.english: We can't understand each other, forever like this

subtitles.original: 変わらない定めに 心理は移ろい
subtitles.english: In the unchanging fate, the truth shifts

subtitles.original: むき出しにされて 掲げた不一致
subtitles.english: Exposed and held up, the disagreement

subtitles.original: 有り触れた刃を 振りかざす
subtitles.english: Wielding an ordinary blade

subtitles.original: あなたには見えていないのでしょう
subtitles.english: You probably cannot see it

subtitles.original: もう 消えない傷
subtitles.english: The wound that will no longer disappear

subtitles.original: 風が吹くように 散ってしまう花の色を
subtitles.english: The color of the flower that scatters like the wind blows

subtitles.original: あなたも知ることも きっとないでしょう
subtitles.english: You probably won't ever know it either

subtitles.original: どこまでも 落ちていく赤い景色
subtitles.english: The red scenery falling endlessly

subtitles.original: 俯いたまま 泣いてた赤い花
subtitles.english: The red flower was crying while looking down

subtitles.original: 朽ちていく心の中 まだ願ってる
subtitles.english: Inside the decaying heart, still wishing

subtitles.original: ありのまま 生きていたいと
subtitles.english: That I want to live as I am

subtitles.original: 悲しい声に言葉に追いやられて
subtitles.english: Driven away by sad voices and words

subtitles.original: 散り行く アネモネ
subtitles.english: The scattering Anemone

subtitles.original: 深く根を張る痛みが 消えなくても
subtitles.english: Even if the deep-rooted pain doesn't disappear

subtitles.original: 諍い続ける 何度だって
subtitles.english: I'll continue to struggle, time and time again

subtitles.original: 淡い想いに 手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reaching out my hand to the faint feelings

subtitles.original: VTuberとしての私
subtitles.english: Myself as a VTuber

subtitles.original: 周りからみた私
subtitles.english: Myself as seen by others

subtitles.original: ワタシがおもう私
subtitles.english: The 'me' that I think of
